name: stratigraphic realization
desc: Perform Fast Geostatistical Realizations of stratigraphic data.

properties.name: Randomness Generator Type
properties.desc: The Randomness Generator Types determine the nature of the Realization deviation patterns.

properties.name: Seed
properties.desc: The Seed is used in the random number generator, and makes it reproducible.

properties.name: Wavelength
properties.desc: Wavelength affects the Randomness Generator. This value is in your coordinate system units. Small values produce an output with higher frequency changes.

properties.name: Min Max Confidence Equivalent
properties.desc: Realization deviations from the nominal kriged results will be constrained to lie within the equivalent Min/Max (plume) bounds. This parameter must lie between 51.00% and 99.995%. Theoretically 50% is the same as the nominal kriged result.

properties.name: Variography Z Scale
properties.desc: The Variography Z Scale value sets the vertical scaling of the variography ellipse and lines.

properties.name: Display Variogram Ellipse
properties.desc: The Display Variogram Ellipse control allows the user to display the variography ellipse.

properties.name: Ellipse Opacity
properties.desc: The Ellipse Opacity control allows the user to set the opacity of the ellipse directly

properties.name: Resolution
properties.desc: The resolution to use for the ellipse. Larger numbers create more detailed representations.

properties.name: Ellipse Scale
properties.desc: The Ellipse Scale will scale the ellipse equally along each axis.

properties.name: X Offset
properties.desc: The X Offset slider will allow the user to translate the ellipse along the x axis

properties.name: Y Offset
properties.desc: The Y Offset slider will allow the user to translate the ellipse along the y axis

properties.name: Z Offset
properties.desc: The Z Offset slider will allow the user to translate the ellipse along the z axis

properties.name: Ellipse Color
properties.desc: The ellipse is a solid color which can be selected using this control.

properties.name: Display Variogram Lines
properties.desc: The Display Variogram Lines allow the user to display lines aligned with the variography ellipse.

properties.name: Line Scale
properties.desc: The Line Scale is a scalar that sets the lenght of the variogram lines relative the scale of the ellipse

properties.name: Primary Ratio Color
properties.desc: The primary ratio axis is a solid color which can be selected using this control.

properties.name: Secondary Ratio Color
properties.desc: The secondary ratio axis is a solid color which can be selected using this control.
